content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Barbara! Could you please provide the address where you need service?
Uh, it’s um, on…wait, do you have me in your system already? It’s the big beige house near the park, close to Main. You might’ve come here before.
Thank you for the information, Barbara. For scheduling, could you please provide your complete address including the street and number? This helps us ensure our technician gets to the right place.
Oh dear, I can’t remember the number right now. It’s just past the playground, first left after the bakery. Does that help at all?
Thank you, Barbara. That’s very helpful! Could you possibly check a piece of mail or perhaps ask someone nearby for your street number? We want to make sure we arrive at the correct location.
Sorry, I just can't find anything with the number now. Maybe I can call back after I dig up some mail.
reason: Customer unable to provide address after repeated attempts.
